title: India, China Strike Out in Talks to Ease Border Dispute
sub_head: Neighbors bulk up with troops and equipment as Himalayan winter nears
body:
NEW DELHIâ€”The latest round of high-level military talks between India and China failed to reach a deal to defuse tensions along their disputed border, the two countries said Monday, as troop deployments in the region have reached their highest level in decades.
The talks held between Indian and Chinese army commanders on Sunday were the latest efforts by the nuclear-armed neighbors to cool a standoff at the border. A Himalayan melee in June 2020 left 20 Indian troops and four Chinese soldiers dead.
